long_description: The Prism Designs Jazz Kite is the answer for beginners to intermediates seeking big thrills from a forgiving and affordable entry-level kite! Complete package contains everything you need to experience the addictive fun of dual-line kiting; includes strong, color-coded Spectra(R) lines. Plus, package includes winder, handles, adjustable bridle and a compact travel case for easy portability to the best winds. Simple and rugged , Jazz provides incredible performance for an entry-level kite, flying with the ease and control of a large kite. Ripstop nylon sail is both tough and light for long-lasting performance; Kevlar(R)-reinforced nose helps the kite absorb unplanned landings. Carbon-fiber/fiberglass hybrid frame with injection-molded fittings is lightweight yet tough enough to withstand the abuses of first-time pilots. With color-coded lines and bridle, plus instructions printed directly onto the sturdy nylon travel case, Jazz sets up for flight in seconds. The Prism Designs Jazz Kite is rated for winds 5 - 25 MPH. Includes insider's tips and hints for successful kiting.
short_description: The Prism Designs Jazz Kite is the answer for beginners to intermediates seeking big thrills from a forgiving and affordable entry-level kite!
